body:
Anyone know of headphones that will only cost around $75 - $175 that i could buy fairly easily?
I really want to improve my channels audio! :/
(I live in Australia BTW)

replies.body:
My headset is $10 and the audio isn't terrible.
I wouldn't recommend buying big expensive headphones / microphones, unless you are a big YouTuber who makes his money from YouTube.

Sorry buddy, I don't really know any good headphones, but I would recommend looking at logitech headphones, as they are quite cheap yet produce nice sound. :)

Good luck! :)

replies.body: Audio techica m30x is REALLY good but it doesnt have a mic sadly : (
replies.body_tagged: Audio techica m30x is REALLY good but it doesnt have a mic sadly : (

replies.body:
The Logitech G230 Stereo Gaming Headset is very good if you want some good headphones with a microphone on it.

For only about $60, I would say it is totally worth it.
replies.body_tagged:
The Logitech G230 Stereo Gaming Headset is very good if you want some good headphones with a microphone on it.

For only about $60, I would say it is totally worth it.

replies.body:
I have a Logitech USB headset, works perfectly fine for me. Around $40.

If you really want legit headphones for listening, I recommend Senheissers for great sound quality and a flat response, Bose for good fit / style / sound quality, Sol Republics for Beats-sounding quality with great build / style, and Monsters for basically same thing as Sol Republic. But, it's perfectly up to you x)
replies.body_tagged:
I have a Logitech USB headset, works perfectly fine for me. Around $40.

If you really want legit headphones for listening, I recommend Senheissers for great sound quality and a flat response, Bose for good fit / style / sound quality, Sol Republics for Beats-sounding quality with great build / style, and Monsters for basically same thing as Sol Republic. But, it's perfectly up to you x)

replies.body: A majority of the time you get for what you pay for, if you want top notch you're going to need to have a little bit higher money budget. If you pay for a 20$ headset it's going to be pretty shitty 75-80$ is much better but as I said, if you want a top notch headset then that is going to be in the higher end money zone.
